items.sentence: Tom said that he didn\'t want to ever see Mary again.
Tom said that it didn\'t take him so long to do that.
Even if you aren\'t hungry, you should eat something.
Tom usually insists on having everything his own way.
I wish I had a house in the same neighborhood as Tom.
Do you think Tom might be in the mood to do that now?
Do you think Tom will go skiing with us next weekend?
I\'m leaving tomorrow afternoon sometime before 2:30.
You should tell Tom that Mary isn\'t able to do that.
A few years ago, I swore never to fall in love again.
